dcterms:creator: J. R. Hershey
Z. Chen
J. Le Roux
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: A dataset containing artificial mixtures created by mixing together single speaker utterances from the Wall Street Journal 0 corpus, used for training and validation in multi-speaker source separation tasks.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal 0 (WSJ0)

dcterms:creator: J. Zegers
H. Van hamme
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training i-vectors, which are speaker representations, derived from the single speaker utterances of the Wall Street Journal 1 corpus.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal 1 (WSJ1)

dcterms:creator: J. R. Hershey
Z. Chen
J. Le Roux
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: A subset of the Wall Street Journal 0 corpus used for training and validation in multi-speaker source separation tasks.
dcterms:title: si tr s set of WSJ0

dcterms:creator: J. R. Hershey
Z. Chen
J. Le Roux
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: A set of utterances from the Wall Street Journal 0 corpus used for testing in multi-speaker source separation tasks.
dcterms:title: si dt 05 and si et 05 set

dcterms:creator: J. Zegers
H. Van hamme
dcterms:description: A Universal Background Model and training data used for obtaining i-vectors, which are speaker representations for improving source separation.
dcterms:title: UBM and T (for i-vectors)
